course_content.core: Semester 1 (14 Weeks) Basic Design Introduction to Digital Tools Basic Drawing 1 Medium and Techniques Language Preparatory 1 Malaysian Studies / Bahasa Melayu Komunikasi Semester 2 (14 Weeks) Basic Drawing 2 Visual Thinking Colour Fundamentals Art Appreciation Language Preparatory 2 Bahasa Kebangsaan A Life Drawing Techniques Semester 3 (14 Weeks) Basic Perspective Drawing Figure Fundamental Study Basic Letterforms Visual Composition & Layout Language Preparatory 3 Semester 4 (14 Weeks) Introduction to Visual Communication Figure Study Design Case Study Watercolour Drawing Integrity And Anti-Corruption

programs.program_name: BA (HONS) Graphic Design (3+0) University of Hertfordshire, UK

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
2 Passes.  SPM-level or equivalent:
pass in Arts subject or an internal assessment by the university
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
Grade B in 5 Subjects.  SPM-level or equivalent:
pass in Arts subject or an internal assessment by the university
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma:
Minimum CGPA 2.00 (Diploma in a related field).  SPM-level or equivalent:
pass in Arts subject or an internal assessment by the university
entry_requirements_raw.STPM:
2 Principal Passes.  SPM-level or equivalent:
pass in Arts subject or an internal assessment by the university
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation:
Minimum CGPA 2.00.  SPM-level or equivalent:
pass in Arts subject or an internal assessment by the university

course_content.core: Year 1 Semester 1 & 2 Critical and Cultural Studies (L4) (30 Credits) Semester 1 Visual Communication (45 Credits) For Local Student: Hubungan Etnik (Compulsory) For International Student: Bahasa Melayu Komunikasi II (Compulsory) Semester 2 Graphic Design Essential 1 (45 Credits) For Local Student: Philosophy and Topical Debates For International Student: Philosophy and Topical Debates Year 2 Semester 1 & 2 Critical and Cultural Studies (L5) (30 Credits) Semester 1 Graphic Design Essential Part 2 (45 Credits) For Local Student: Business & Marketing (Compulsory) For International Student: Bahasa Kebangsaan A (Compulsory) Semester 2 Graphic Design Professional Development (15 Credits) Graphic Design Live Projects (30 Credits) Year 3 Semester 1 Graphic Design Advanced Practice 1 (30 Credits) Graphic Design Degree Essay (30 Credits) For Local Student: Culture & Humanities (Compulsory) For International Student: Culture & Humanities (Compulsory) Semester 2 Graphic Design Advanced Practice  2 (60 Credits) For International Student: Community Service (Compulsory) For Local Student: Community Service (Compulsory) Internship( 12-week period )

SPM-level or equivalent:
pass in Arts subject or an internal assessment by the university

course_content.core: Year 1 Semester 1 Design Studio 1: Anatomy of Space  (15 Credits) Communication 1: Representing Space  (15 Credits) Technology 1: Introducing Materiality   (15 Credits) Critical and Cultural Studies L4  (15 Credits) For Local Student: For Local Student: Hubungan Etnik (Compulsory) For International Student: Bahasa Melayu Komunikasi II (Compulsory) Semester 2 Semester 2 Design Studio 2: Serious Play  (30 Credits) Communication 2: Digital Skills   (15 Credits) Sustainability: Past, Present and Future   (15 Credits) For Local Student: Tamadun Islam & Tamadun Asia (Compulsory) For International Student: Malaysian Studies (Compulsory)  Year 2 Semester 1 Design Studio 3: Close-Up  (15 Credits) Communication 3: Digital Skills 2  (15 Credits) Technology 2: Detail  (15 Credits) Sustainability in Practice  (15 Credits) For Local Student: Business & Marketing (Compulsory) OR Bahasa Kebangsaan A (Compulsory) For International Student: Business & Marketing (Compulsory) Semester 2 Critical and Cultural Studies L5  (15 Credits) Design Studio 4: Inside Out  (15 Credits) Professional Development 1: Preparing for Industry  (15 Credits)  Year 3 Semester 1 Design Studio 5: Generator  (15 Credits) Technology 3: Contemporary Technologies  (15 Credits) Critical & Cultural Studies L6: Degree Essay/ Report (Design)  (30 Credits) For Local Student: Culture & Humanities(Compulsory) For International Student: Culture & Humanities (Compulsory)  Semester 2 Design Studio 6: Augment  (45 Credits) Professional Development 2: Professional Practice & Employability  (15 Credits) For Local Student: Community Service(Compulsory) For International Student: Community Service (Compulsory) Internship

programs.program_name: BA (HONS) Digital Media Design (3+0) University of Hertfordshire, UK

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level: 2 Passes.  Applicants may be required to submit a portfolio for assessment
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Grade B in 5 Subjects.  Applicants may be required to submit a portfolio for assessment
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma: Minimum CGPA 2.50 (Diploma in Creative Multimedia or related). Candidates with CGPA between 2.00 and 2.50 may be admitted, subject to an internal assessment process.  Applicants may be required to submit a portfolio for assessment
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: 2 Principal Passes.  Applicants may be required to submit a portfolio for assessment
entry_requirements_raw.Foundation: Minimum CGPA 2.00.  Applicants may be required to submit a portfolio for assessment

course_content.core: Year 1 Semester 1 & 2 Visual Communication and Core Media Production(45 Credits) Interaction and Hybrid Media Construction   (45 Credits) Media in Mind: Histories, Theories, Contexts (C&CS)   (30 Credits) For Local Student: Hubungan Etnik (Compulsory) Tamandun Islam & Tamadun Asia (Compulsory) For International Student: Bahasa Melayu Komunikasi II (Compulsory) Malaysian Studies (Compulsory)  Year 2 Semester 1 & 2 Teamwork Practices (30 Credits) Independent Project   (30 Credits) User Experience Design   (15 Credits) Storytelling & Gaming   (15 Credits) Connections & Perspectives I : Exploring Creative Media and Digital Cultures   (15 Credits) Connections & Perspectives II : Exploring Creative Media and Digital Cultures   (15 Credits) For Local Student: Bahasa Kebangsaan (Compulsory) Business & Marketing (Compulsory) For International Student: Business & Marketing (Compulsory)  Year 3 Semester 1 & 2 Degree Project (60 Credits) Dissertation (C&CS)   (30 Credits) Professional Practices   (30 Credits) For Local Student: Culture & Humanities (Compulsory) Community Service (Compulsory) For International Student: Culture & Humanities (Compulsory)  Internship

A-Level.text: 2 Passes.  Applicants may be required to submit a portfolio for assessment

UEC.text: Grade B in 5 Subjects.  Applicants may be required to submit a portfolio for assessment

Diploma.text: Minimum CGPA 2.50 (Diploma in Creative Multimedia or related). Candidates with CGPA between 2.00 and 2.50 may be admitted, subject to an internal assessment process.  Applicants may be required to submit a portfolio for assessment

STPM.text: 2 Principal Passes.  Applicants may be required to submit a portfolio for assessment

Foundation.text: Minimum CGPA 2.00.  Applicants may be required to submit a portfolio for assessment

entry_requirements_raw.SPM: 3 credits (3Cs) including a credit in Mathematics.
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: 3 credits (3Bs) including a credit in Mathematics.  Credit in Mathematics at SPM level
entry_requirements_raw.STPM: Grade C (GP 2.0) in any subjects.  Credit in Mathematics at SPM level

course_content.core: Year 1, Semester 1 Structured Programming I Creative Coding Applied Mathematics for Computer Science Language & Communication Skills I Malaysian Studies 2 (MPU Compulsory) Bahasa Melayu Komunikasi 1 (MPU Compulsory) Year 1, Semester 2 Computing System Components Structured Programming II Analytic Geometry and Linear Algebra Introduction to Software Development Language & Communication Skills 2 Year 1, Semester 3 Introduction to C++ Fundamentals of Game Design Calculus and Analytic Geometry Year 2, Semester 1 Object Oriented Programming in C++ Game System Architecture Game Physics Software Development Project 1 Business and Marketing (MPU Compulsory) Bahasa Kebangsaan A (MPU Compulsory for Malaysian Student without Credit in BM) Year 2, Semester 2 Programming for Game Engines Data Structures and Algorithms Introduction to System Design Methods Introduction to Database Software Development Project 2 Year 2, Semester 3 Client-Side Web Technologies Software Development Project 3 Culture and Humanities (MPU Compulsory) Year 3, Semester 1 Server-Side Web Technologies Game AI Introduction to Level Design Methods Software Development Project 4 Community Service (MPU Compulsory) Year 3, Semester 2 Shader Programming Programming Mobile Applications Introduction to Technical Design Methods Software Development Project 5 Multiplayer Game Programming Year 3, Semester 3 Year 3, Semester 3 Internship (8 - 12 weeks)

course_content.core:
Year 1, Semester 1 Introduction to Computing Systems Design Process 
Probability and Statistics for Designers Introduction to Computer Technology and Programming Malaysian Studies 2 (MPU Compulsory) Bahasa Melayu Komunikasi 1 (MPU Compulsory) Year 1, Semester 2 Object Oriented Programming for Designers Fundamentals of Interactive Design Fundamentals of Technical Design Introduction to Psychology Language & Communication Skills Year 1, Semester 3 Introduction to 2D Raster Graphics Systems Design Fundamentals I Game Production I: Pre-Production Phase Year 2, Semester 1 Programming Game Engines for Designers Level Design for 2D Games Introduction to Cognitive Psychology Game Production I: Production Phase Business and Marketing (MPU Compulsory) Bahasa Kebangsaan A (MPU Compulsory for Malaysian Student without Credit in BM) Year 2, Semester 2 Technical Design of 2D Games Fundamentals of User Experience Design I Methodologies for User Research I Game Production I: Post-Production Phase Law of Creative Industry Year 2, Semester 3 Introduction to 3D Digital Art Game Production II: Pre-Production Phase Culture and Humanities (MPU Compulsory) Year 3, Semester 1 Systems Design Fundamentals II Level Design for 3D Games Fundamentals of Sound Design Game Production II: Production Phase Community Service (MPU Compulsory) Year 3, Semester 2 Fundamentals of User Experience Design II Methodologies for User Research II Analysis of Game Systems Narrative Design: Building Interactive Stories Game Production II: Post-Production Phase Website Design: Portfolio Building Year 3, Semester 3 Year 3, Semester 3 Internship (8 - 12 weeks)

STPM.text: Grade C (GP 2.0) in any subjects.  Pass an interview or an assessment of a portfolio conducted by The One Academy.

programs.program_name: Foundation in Interior Architecture and Design

entry_requirements_raw.SPM: Pass with at least 5 credits including pass in Bahasa Melayu, Sejarah， English and Mathematics.
entry_requirements_raw.O-Level: Pass with at least 5 Grade C including pass in English and Mathematics.
entry_requirements_raw.UEC: Pass with 5Bs including pass in English and Mathematics.
